NeuroConnect

Support hub for autistic expats and family

About us

NeuroConnect offers support and resources tailored to autistic individuals and their loved ones living abroad. Whether you're navigating a new healthcare system or seeking a sense of community, we're here to help.

Our services

We offer a variety of services to support autistic expats and their families:

  • Free guidance on navigating the Dutch healthcare system, provided by our dedicated volunteers.
  • Support groups led by certified coaches, designed to help you connect and share experiences.
Explore our services

Our events

Discover new ways to engage with like-minded individuals in a supportive community. Whether you're into book clubs, game nights, or nature walks, there's something for everyone.

Our events are a great way to connect with others, make friends, and enjoy activities in a safe and welcoming space.
